name: Single Unit
description:
An RTS where you can only control up to 1 unit. As such, things can quickly get out of hand. I made all assets myself within the time frame*. Note: the AI's have randomly generated "personality" traits that affect their behavior. Try to take control of the stupider ones!

Controls:

Click(LMB) or 'Q' or numpad0: Control ship.

Esc or 'E': Uncontrol ship.

Spacebar: Fire

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move

Numpad1-5: Change Game Speed (2 is default). [May not work right in browser].

Backspace: Force restart game

*Technically for the music I remade a previous song of mine from scratch and changed it around a bit.
